#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long max_sub_array(long long arr[],long long l,long long h)

{
    long long max_end_here=0,max_so_far=0,i;
    for(i=l;i<=h;i++)
    {
        max_end_here=max_end_here+arr[i];
        if(max_end_here<0)max_end_here=0;
        if(max_so_far<max_end_here)max_so_far=max_end_here;
    }
    return max_so_far;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long n,x,i,maxsum,y;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&x);
        long long arr[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>y;
            arr[i]=y-x;
        }
        maxsum= max_sub_array(arr,0,n-1);
        printf("%lld\n",maxsum);

    }
   return 0;
}
